data.name: My Dream Girl
data.detailed_description:
Are you looking for a fun and relaxing game to kill some time? That’s a crazy coincidence, because it’s been looking for you! Start out by clicking on the girl, earn XP and gold, spend it to upgrade your characteristics, earn new items that will help you find new ways to give pleasure. Feel the power as you grow exponentially!

Game Features:

- This game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy your time.
- Get beautiful rewards as you progress (new skins for your girlfriend)
- Upgrade your skills
- Beautiful 3D art
- Relaxing mood

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________

TRAILER SOUNDTRACK:

Sunny by LiQWYD | https://soundcloud.com/liqwyd/
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/
Licensed under Creative Commons: Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 750 Ti / AMD Radeon® R7 260X with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9400f @2.9hz / AMD-FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050TI with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
